mapper.select: select push_content_id, type_id, title, body, param, path, description, auto_flag, send_flag, total_cnt, suc_cnt, fail_cnt, reg_dt, send_dt, req_dt from member_push_contents where send_flag = 0 and req_dt < now() order by push_content_id asc limit 1
select push_id, push_content_id, member_cd, fcm_token, reg_dt, send_dt from member_push where push_content_id = #{pushContentId} and fcm_token is not null and fcm_token != '' order by push_id asc
mapper.update: update member_push set send_flag = 0 , send_dt = now() where push_id = #{pushId}
